title: Courgette Cannelloni
ingredients: ['4 courgettes', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '300g beef mince', '400g tomato passata or sieved tomatoes', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '30g grated gruyere cheese', 'Salt and pepper']
